峗字的基本解释

峗
wéi
〔三峗〕山名，在中国甘肃省敦煌市东南，如“投三苗于峗峗。”亦作“三危”。

峗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wéi］
［《廣韻》魚爲切，平支，疑。］
山名用字。
[②]［wěi］
［《集韻》五委切，上紙，疑。］
高峻貌。

峗字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　峗； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页310第36
【廣韻】魚爲切【集韻】【正韻】吾回切【韻會】虞爲切，?音危。三峗，山名。通作危。【書·禹貢】三危旣宅。【疏】在鳥鼠西，與㟭山近，黑水出其南。卽三苗地。【後漢·西羌傳】三危山在沙州燉煌城東南，以山有三峰，故曰三危。　又【玉篇】【廣韻】【集韻】?五罪切，音隗。山貌。與峞嵬通。　又【集韻】魚屈切，音崛。峗崪，山貌。或从兀。

考證：〔【書·禹貢】三危厎績。〕　謹照原文厎績改旣宅。

暂无。

Ai
wéi

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wéi］
["Guangyun" The fish is cut, flat, suspicious. ]
The name of the mountain is written in words.
[②]［wěi］

Majestic appearance.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　峗; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 310 Page 36
[Guang Yun] Fish is cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] I will cut back [Rhyme will] Yu is cut, the sound is dangerous. Sanai, the name of the mountain. Pass in danger. 【Book·Yugong】Three Dangerous Houses. 【Sparse】In the west of Niaoshu, close to Mi Mountain, Heishui goes to the south.卽三苗地. [Later Han·Xiqiang Biography] Sanwei Mountain is in the southeast of Xuanhuang City, Shazhou. There are three peaks on the mountain, so it is called Sanwei.　[Yu Pian] [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Five sins are cut, Yin Wei. Mountain appearance. It is connected to the 峞嵬.　 [Ji Yun] Yu Qu cut, sound rise. Aiyu, mountain appearance. Or from Wu. Textual research: [[Book·Yugong] Three Dangers. 〕　I would like to change the house according to the original performance.
